title: Maldives Private Island Villa Luxury with Roundtrip International Flights, All-Inclusive Dining & Unlimited Drinks
description:
Bringing world-renowned Thai hospitality to the brilliant-blue heart of the archipelago’s Baa Atoll, Dusit Thani Maldives offers all-inclusive villa luxury unlike anything else. It’s also a true diver’s delight, boasting a PADI-certified dive centre and cradled by one of the Maldives’ best house reefs - part of the greater UNESCO World Biosphere Reserve and home to majestic whale sharks and whirling manta rays. Return from days spent in the great blue beyond to warm white sands and a dazzling array of world-class dining, including fiery, authentic Thai plates at Benjarong and Maldivian delicacies at Sea Grill.

Your all-inclusive package goes beyond even the Maldives’ legendary standard here - daily breakfast, a dolphin cruise and a far-reaching cocktail list all await. Dusit Thani Maldives is also the perfect choice for families seeking Maldivian magic together, with beach parties, the treetop Baan Sanook Kids' Club and an outdoor cinema all providing countless hours of wonder and excitement for little ones.
offer_address: Mudhdhoo Island Road, Baa Atoll 20000, Maldives
